function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Decrease in investment in smart buildings leading to reduced implementation of safety and health applications","Impact":"Increased risk of contagion and transmission of diseases within built environments","Mitigation":"Encouraging and incentivizing organizations to invest in safety and health applications of smart buildings","Technologies":"Smart HVAC systems, thermal imaging technology, mobile workplace apps, space monitoring analytics","People":"Building occupants, visitors, and employees","Owner":"Organizations, building owners, and facility management"},{"Description":"Slowdown in digitization due to COVID-19 outbreak","Impact":"Reduced implementation of workplace safety technology and smart building initiatives","Mitigation":"Providing support and resources for organizations to accelerate digitization and invest in workplace safety technology","Technologies":"Smart building technologies, IoT, workplace safety technology","People":"Organizations and corporate executives","Owner":"Technology providers, government agencies, and industry associations"},{"Description":"Inadequate ventilation, indoor air quality, and lighting impacting transmission of COVID-19","Impact":"Increased risk of airborne transmission of viruses within indoor environments","Mitigation":"Implementation of smart HVAC systems, adoption of UV irradiation, increased air change rate, and night ventilation","Technologies":"Smart HVAC systems, UV irradiation technology, ventilation monitoring systems","People":"Building occupants, visitors, and employees","Owner":"Building owners, facility management, and public health authorities"}]}
